titleInfo.title: Title from envelope: __Portrait of Israel and Rebecca Kortz

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 4 x 3 inches, black and white

mods.abstract: Full-length portrait of Israel Kortz in his suit and bowler hat and Rebecca Kortz in a dress and hat. She holds a parasol. The Kortz family originated in Brest Litovsk, Russia, and arrived in Denver, Colorado around 1885. The Kortz family and their descendants contributed to the development of Denver and its Jewish community.
mods.note: Copy was donated by the Kortz Family for A Colorado Jewish Family Album.
